## DATASET
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = FALSE,
	message = TRUE,
	warning = TRUE
)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r DATASET}
df = read.csv("~/Downloads/EDA_Ecommerce_Assessment.csv")
head(df,3)
```

### SUMMARY
```{r summary}
df_summary=summary(df)
head(df_summary)
```

```{r plot, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(df, aes(x = Purchase_Amount)) + 
  geom_histogram(color = "black", bins = 100, fill="deepskyblue4") + 
  labs(title = "Purchase Amount Distribution", y = "Frequency", x = "Purchase Amount")

ggplot(df, aes(x = Purchase_Amount)) + 
  geom_boxplot(color = "black", bins = 100, fill="deepskyblue4") + 
  labs(title = "Purchase Amount Distribution", y = "Frequency", x = "Purchase Amount")
```
